abstract: The American power producer Exelon said on Tuesday that it had agreed to buy John Deere Renewables, a wind power company, in a deal that may be worth up to $900 million.
snippet: The American power producer Exelon said on Tuesday that it had agreed to buy John Deere Renewables, a wind power company, in a deal that may be worth up to $900 million.
lead_paragraph: The American power producer Exelon said on Tuesday that it had agreed to buy John Deere Renewables, a wind power company, in a deal that may be worth up to $900 million.

headline.main: Exelon to Buy Wind Power Firm John Deere Renewables
